item.title: 杰克-吉伦哈尔（Jake Gyllenhaal）谈重拍 1989 年原版电影《路屋》的挑战。在新版中，吉伦哈尔模仿帕特里克-斯维兹（Patrick Swayze）饰演道尔顿（Dalton），一个试图摆脱黑暗过去的前终极格斗锦标赛（UFC）拳手。
item.description:
Jake Gyllenhaal on the challenge of remaking the original 1989 "Road House" film. In the new version, Gyllenhaal channels Patrick Swayze as Dalton, an ex-UFC fighter trying to escape his dark past. pic.twitter.com/645usvoVgs

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 20, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：警方称，三名爱达荷州狱警在博伊西一家医院劫持一名囚犯时遭到枪击。对两人的搜寻仍在继续。
item.description:
BREAKING: Three Idaho corrections officers were shot when a shooter broke an inmate out of a Boise hospital, police said. A search continues for both. https://t.co/b2sNqIyTr3

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 康纳-麦格雷戈（Conor McGregor）说，也许他可以成为电影动作明星。 这位前 UFC 格斗选手将与杰克-吉伦哈尔（Jake Gyllenhaal）共同出演经典邪典电影《公路旅店》的翻拍版。
item.description:
Conor McGregor says maybe he could become a movie action star. The former UFC fighter stars alongside Jake Gyllenhaal in the remake of the classic cult film "Road House." pic.twitter.com/capr37mXkd

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 20, 2024

item.title: 爱尔兰总理利奥-瓦拉德卡（Leo Varadkar）周三宣布，他将立即辞去爱尔兰联合政府中右翼政党费恩盖尔党（Fine Gael）党魁一职，并将在党内领导人竞选结束后接替他的总理职务。
item.description:
Irish Prime Minister Leo Varadkar announced Wednesday he is quitting immediately as head of the center-right Fine Gael party, part of Ireland’s coalition government, and will be replaced as prime minister, or taoiseach, after a party leadership contest. pic.twitter.com/FqQwbvcNzV

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 根据 78 亿美元的协议，ESPN 将在 2031 年之前继续作为大学橄榄球季后赛的主办方
item.description:

item.title: 最新消息：与印尼现任总统和过去的独裁政权有关系的前特种部队将军普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）被确认为2月14日总统选举的获胜者，击败了发誓要在法庭上对选举结果提出异议的两位前省长。
item.description:
BREAKING: Prabowo Subianto, a former special forces general with ties to Indonesia's current president and past dictatorship, was confirmed the victor of the Feb. 14 presidential election over two former governors who vowed to contest the result in court. https://t.co/blpQqjqJ6f

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 20, 2024

item.title: 瑞金娜-金（Regina King）说，在为 "雪莉"（Shirley Chisholm）一剧工作 15 年之后，终于能在银幕上展现开拓性政治家雪莉-奇肖姆（Shirley Chisholm）的故事，感觉 "超现实"。
item.description:
Regina King says it feels "surreal" to finally bring the story of trailblazing politician Shirley Chisholm to the screen in "Shirley," after 15 years working on the project. pic.twitter.com/UhKXGKA3lk

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) March 20, 2024

item.title: 巴黎圣母院在火灾中受损近五年后开始拆除脚手架。请观看美联社在巴黎 La Tour d'Argent 露台上拍摄的延时摄影，记录大教堂的修复和新尖顶的出现。
item.description:
Notre Dame is starting to shed its scaffolding, nearly five years after it was damaged in a fire.

Watch this AP timelapse, filmed from the terrace of La Tour d’Argent in Paris, capture the restoration and emergence of the cathedral’s new spire. pic.twitter.com/wzKNJIGntM

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 20, 2024
